install.name: redSHOP Google Checkout Payments
install.author: RedTeam
install.description: This plugin enables standard Google Checkout Payments for redSHOP

param.name: payment_oprand
param.label: Discount Payment Amount operand
param.description: Discount Payment Amount operand For example '-','+'

param.name: is_test
param.label: Select either the sandbox or live production environment
param.description: Select either the sandbox or live production environment

param.name: merchant_id
param.label: Google Merchant ID
param.description: Your merchant ID is listed on the 'Integration' page under the 'Settings' tab

param.name: merchant_key
param.label: Google Merchant Key
param.description: Your merchant KEY is listed on the 'Integration' page under the 'Settings' tab

param.name: button_style
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Google Checkout Button Style My website has a WHITE or COLORED background

param.name: economic_payment_terms_id
param.label: Enter E-conomic Terms of payment Id
param.description: You can get it from E-conomic Sales Tab, Other Setup->Terms of payment View

param.name: shopper_group_id
param.label: Shopper Group
param.description: Allow Plugin only for selected shopper groups. Select none for all.
